meanings.definition: The art or trade of joining pieces of wood together to construct furniture or other structures.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather learned the joinery skills to build beautiful tables and chairs.
meanings.sent2: The joinery in this cabinet is so well-crafted, it will last for generations.
meanings.sent3: The joinery master accidentally glued his own fingers together while working on a project.
meanings.sent4: The joinery of our teamwork was so strong, we could accomplish any task together.
meanings.sent5: The intricate joinery of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put together.

meanings.definition: The wooden components or structures created through the process of joinery.
meanings.sent1: The joinery of the chair was so sturdy, it could support even the heaviest person.
meanings.sent2: The joinery used in the construction of the house gave it a classic and timeless look.
meanings.sent3: The joinery of the treehouse made it feel like a magical hideaway in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The joinery of the bridge connected the two sides of the river, allowing people to cross safely.
meanings.sent5: The intricate joinery of the model ship displayed the craftsman's attention to detail.
